alert.note: Alert for Charles Mix; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:29PM MDT until June 24 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CHARLES MIX...NORTHWESTERN BON HOMME AND SOUTHWESTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dante, or 13 miles northwest of Tyndall, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Tripp around 440 PM CDT. Tyndall and Kaylor around 450 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include eastern Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
